document_data.title: Shadows in the Stacks
document_data.story arc:
[[Adventurers League/Dreams of the Red Wizards|Dreams of the Red Wizards]]
Terminal Ambitions Adventure: Shadow Games
document_data.mainbody:
'''''Shadows in the Stacks''''', designed by [[Greg Marks]] and [[Oliver Darkshrie]], is an adventure in the [[Adventurers League/Dreams of the Red Wizards|Dreams of the Red Wizards]] storyline published for the [[Adventurers League]]. It is the third part of the Shadow Games series.

{{Quote|''Hoping to put names to the location descriptions you uncovered in Waterdeep, you head to Candlekeep. You are not alone. Some want what you know, others don’t want you to learn more.''{{Cite adventurers league/Shadows in the Stacks|1}}|}}
